page.title: 04A MANS WORKING DAY
page.content:
My dad starts work at{8.00am}down at the "Prodive".When all the men have got to Prodive my dad does a three
hour lecture on diving.Somtimes after the lecture they have P.E.In P.E they jump off the side of the docks for a swim. After that they have a shower then they eat their dinner.Some people are flown in with the bends and my dad has to stay in the de-compresion-chamber with them.Sometimes He stays in the de compression chamber for hours He normally home at {5.30pm. The job my dad does is unusual,but very important in a seaside and docks town.
